text: Kevin James Burns (7 June 1960 in Invercargill â€” 20 May 2024 in Queenstown) was a New Zealand cricketer who played for Otago in the Plunket Shield and Southland in the Hawke Cup. He never played for New Zealand in international cricket. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2024 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Invercargill
title: Kevin Burns (cricketer)
